about_the_game:
With a heavy focus on strategy & tactics, TTS:Redux tests your skills in matches against friends & players all over the world. Play games with 5 to 10 players per team, use the new physics based kicking system to customize your kicks and put your reflexes to the test with skill based goalkeepers.

Featuring full steam multiplayer integration and a completely new engine - the tactical soccer strategy game that know and love (or more likely didn't) is back! TableTop Soccer: Redux is a completely redesigned version of the original game with a slew of new features.

Current Features
  • Multiplayer Matches - Play against your friends and players all over the world
  • Skill based goalkeepers - Test your reflexes and skills to ruin your opponents day
  • Physics kicks - Get control over the ball with physics based kicking allowing you to customize how you kick the ball
  • Up to 10 players - Play from 5 a side games to full 10 player teams
  • Open pitch - No more grids on the pitch, move your players anywhere
  • 3D Camera - Control your view of the action
  • Customizable Players - Configure your players with 3 body types, 6 faces, 4 haircuts, 40+ hair and skin tones
  • Customizable Team - Configure your team with 4 colors and a personal formation to match your strategy
  • Full steam multiplayer integration - Steam invites, Steam lobbies (public/friends only) and chat
  • Configurable Matches - Configure your matches total turns, duration, number of players
  • Steam Cloud - Automatically saves your team & player configurations
  • Offline Play - No internet required to play Solo games

    This is a completely reworked game, new project, new assets, significantly improved graphics and brand new gameplay. Get on the pitch today and play some games!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
